about_the_game:
Tricky Towers Original Soundtrack by Jonathan van den Wijngaarden

Track list:

01 - Menu Theme
02 - Gravity Grumble (Race Mode)
03 - Complicated Columns (Puzzle Mode)
04 - Moonlight Mayhem (Survival Mode)
05 - Swinging Spires (Race Special)
06 - Lose Theme
07 - Win Theme
detailed_description:
Tricky Towers Original Soundtrack by Jonathan van den Wijngaarden

Track list:

01 - Menu Theme
02 - Gravity Grumble (Race Mode)
03 - Complicated Columns (Puzzle Mode)
04 - Moonlight Mayhem (Survival Mode)
05 - Swinging Spires (Race Special)
06 - Lose Theme
07 - Win Theme

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS
  • Processor: 2GHZ or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Your computer must be able to play mp3 files

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.8 or higher
  • Processor: Dual core or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Your computer must be able to play mp3 files

name: Tricky Towers - Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or greater
  • Processor: 1.73 GHz Intel Pentium M or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Your computer must be able to play mp3 files

short_description: Tricky Towers Original Soundtrack by Jonathan van den Wijngaarden
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian, Portuguese - Portugal, Dutch
